tag_list: product-management, strategic-solutions, presales, software-development, agile-methodology, client-presentations, prototypes, vendor-relations, team-management, onsiteoffshore-management, b2c-and-b2b-web-applications, online-marketing, advertising, email
overview:
Iqbal is a product and technology leader with extensive experience in strategic solutions and software development. His areas of interest are digital marketing, online optimization, e-business, social media, and software as a service.

Iqbal is currently the CTO at Invoke Solutions, a marketing research company with an industry pioneering real-time concept optimization technology.

Prior to Invoke, Iqbal worked in leadership roles as CTO at Tangent Media and Vice President of Product Engineering at Imagitas. In the earlier years of his career, Iqbal co-founded Supersiswa in Jakarta, Indonesia, provided scheduling optimization solutions for i2 Technologies, and developed Genetic Algorithms for Mahindra British Telecom.
